# hasAttendees

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has attendees.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasAttendees: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the calendar item has attendees; otherwise it does not.

## Displaying Attendees

- **attendees**: The attendees associated with the calendar item, as an array of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKParticipant] objects.
